Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 42nd overall pick, by Seattle in 2005...
Injured on 7/24/2006 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit (triple) on 8/8/2007, off Danny Mota (LAA)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/28/2007, off Oliver Perez (OAK)...
Injured on 6/12/2012 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 5 weeks...
Hit 3 homeruns against Oakland, driving in 6 runs on 7/30/2012...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/2013, hitting .500 with 5 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/7/2014 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Hit for the cycle against Los Angeles (A) on 4/26/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/27/2015, hitting .545 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2017, hitting .565 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Chicago (A), driving in 8 runs on 9/2/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/22/2020, hitting .476 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/10/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Injured on 6/25/2021 with a Broken Jaw, out for 4-5 weeks...
Hit 3 homeruns against Arizona, driving in 4 runs on 8/27/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/13/2021, hitting .538 with 5 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/1/2022, off Cory Luebke (PIT)...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/6/2023 to a 2-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
